thread.title: Boutique Sexy Luxurious
thread.title_full: Boutique Sexy Luxurious - Review of Seven Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: brbrshana
title: Boutique Sexy Luxurious
text:
We stayed in the suite on the top floor. This was very comfortable and the decor was very sexy. Strippers pole, Huge bath tub, black out curtains and staff at your beck n call. I would recommend and I would come here again.
Room Tip: definitely a room on the top floor! See more room tips
